definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr 25:13 envoy, messenger;—´[[ח]] abs. Je 49:14 +, cstr. pr Je 13:17; pl. [[חִירִים]] Is 18:2; sf. [[חִרַיִךְ]] Is 57:9; —envoy, from Cush Is 18:2, from apostate Isr. Is 57:9; —envoy from Cush Is 18:2, from apostate Isr. Is 57:9; from ´[[ח]] Je 49:14 = Ob:Ob 1; messenger in gen. [[חִיר אְֶמוּנִים]] Pr 13:17, [[נֶאְֶמָן]] ´[[ח]] Pr 25:13.—I. [[חִיר]] v. IV. [[חור]]. p.849
